conclusion: Analyze the given velocity-time graphs for two cars traveling in the same direction on a straight highway from t=0 to t1.
The graphs represent the velocity-time relationships for Car A and Car B.
Both graphs start at t=0 with the same velocity v1.
Both graphs end at t=t1 with the same velocity v2.
Since both cars start at the same velocity v1 and travel at the same velocity v2 until t1, their displacements will be the same.
The graphs are symmetric about the time t1, indicating equal displacements during this interval.
Conclude that the displacements of Car A and Car B are the same during the time interval from t=0 to t1.
Yes, the displacements of cars A and B are the same during this period.
